meta.title: PomMoms - Web3 Social Platform for Pomeranian Lovers
meta.description: PomMoms is a growing community for Pomeranian lovers. Share, connect, and earn rewards!

hero.title: PomMoms
hero.subtitle: Web3 Social Platform for Pomeranian Lovers
hero.description: A community made for people who love their Pomeranians like family.

about.title: What is PomMoms?
about.story_title: Our Story: A Pom, a Family, a Social Network Like No Other
about.story_content: We are Alex, Yesi, and Bruno‚Äîa dog-loving family who found in our love for Pomeranians the inspiration for something much bigger: PomMoms, the first social network designed exclusively for those who live with, care for, or simply love Pomeranians, and for those who dream of being part of their world.
about.community_content: PomMoms isn't just for those who already have a Pom. It's for everyone who wants to be part of a community that shares values, experiences, and love for dogs‚ÄîPoms or otherwise.

features.title: What can you do on PomMoms?
features.subtitle: Join our vibrant community and enjoy these amazing features, with more coming soon!
features.profile_description: Create profiles for you and your furry friend, sharing their story and connecting with other Pom Moms and Dads.
features.alert_description: Report a lost Pom and activate an alert with rewards to help bring them home safely.
features.adoption_description: Adopt a Pom or help others find forever homes for these adorable companions.
features.map_description: Explore places recommended by the community where your Pom will be welcomed with open arms.
features.market_description: Buy and sell products and services like grooming, collars, treats, or obedience classes.
features.events_description: Attend and organize walks, parties, or gatherings in your city with fellow Pom enthusiasts.
features.blockchain_description: We're integrating tokenomics on the Solana network, so all your activity on the platform will have real value. PomMoms will have its own cryptocurrency with real-world value!
features.early_adopter_description: Those who join from the beginning will receive special rewards, as you'll be part of a history that's about to be written.

register.title: How do I register?
register.description: You can sign in very easily with your Google or Facebook account. And if you want to explore more advanced features later (like tokens), you can also connect a digital wallet with a few simple steps.

community.title: PomMoms is more than a social network
community.description: It's a safe, fun community focused 100% on the love for Pomeranians. Here, we all understand what it means to have a playful, sweet, and personality-filled furry friend. And yes, here Poms have their own space to shine.

waitlist.title: Join the Waitlist!
waitlist.subtitle: If you're a Pom Mom or Dad, you're already part of the family.
waitlist.button: I want to be part of PomMoms
waitlist.success: Thank you! We'll be in touch soon.
waitlist.error: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again.

footer.rights: Made with love, paws, and tokens üêæ
